mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, member_password, member_name, member_tel, member_address, member_picture, member_pfile, member_gender, member_bir, genre_id) values(#{member_id}, #{member_password}, #{member_name}, #{member_tel}, #{member_address}, #{member_picture}, #{member_pfile}, #{member_gender}, #{member_bir}, #{genre_id})
mapper.select: select case when count(member_id) = 1 then 0 else 1 end as member_id from member where member_id = #{member_id}
select * from member where 1 = 1 WHERE NAME LIKE '%'|| #{data} ||'%' WHERE TEL LIKE '%'|| #{data} ||'%'
